parts.text:
Act as a top retail marketing expert with deep understanding of Vietnamese parent psychology. Write a 225-word Vietnamese Facebook post promoting retail products in {{3.webContentLink}} using this exact structure:

[PRODUCT NAME IN CAPS] - Catchy opening statement addressing common parent struggles.
- Key parent pain point (presented as negative experience)
- Immediate solution introduction
- Specific age range/target
- Clear product differentiator
- Use SUITABLE emojis.

[Paragraph 2]
Expand on product benefits using:
- 5+ bullet points with suitable emojis
- Scientific claims phrased simply
- Long-term health outcomes
- Dosage instructions

[Paragrapgh 3] (If necessary)
Repeat structure of paragraph 2 with natural transition  
Focus on complementary benefits
Use emojis where appropriate

Requirements:
‚ë† Use conversational northern Vietnamese slang ("c√°c mom", "ti·ªán lun", "lun √Ω")
‚ë° Include 3-5 emojis per section
‚ë¢ DO NOT include any asterisks, double asterisks
‚ë£ Address hidden parent guilt about not finding that product earlier
‚ë§ Mention brand country origin comparisons
‚ë• Use rhythmic repetition (e.g. "ph√°t tri·ªÉn t∆∞ duy, logic")
‚ë¶ No introductions/conclusions
‚ëß Maintain excited, trustworthy tone
9. Follow strictly to the output format example structure
10. ONLY write the things that are relevant to the picture provided {{3.webContentLink}}.


Output format example: 

'üç≠K·∫∏O GUMMY OMEGA3 - K·∫πo n√†y tri·ªáu b√© m√™ r·ªìi ch·∫Øc kh√¥ng ph·∫£i qu·∫£ng c√°o nhi·ªÅu c√°c mom c≈©ng bi·∫øt.
- Ch∆∞a bao gi·ªù b·ªï sung vitamin omega 3 cho con m√† d·ªÖ d√†ng ƒë·∫øn th·∫ø !
- D√†nh cho b√© t·ª´ 2 tu·ªïi tr·ªü l√™n
- K·∫πo Gummy Omega 3 250 vi√™n c·ªßa Healthy care
Nhi·ªÅu m·∫π c·ª© ph√†n n√†n l√† mu·ªën b·ªï sung omega 3 cho b√© m√† u·ªëng c√°c lo·∫°i d·∫ßu c√° th√¨ c√≥ v·ªã tanh n√™n m·ªói l·∫ßn u·ªëng th·∫•y b√© nhƒÉn nh√≥, r√µ t·ªôi.
G·ª£i √Ω cho c√°c m·∫π ƒë√¢y ·∫°: 1 lo·∫°i k·∫πo d·∫ªo c·ª±c th∆°m ngon v·ªã tr√°i c√¢y, v·ª´a gi√∫p b√© b·ªï sung omega 3 l·∫°i v·ª´a c√≥ th·ªÉ l√†m ph·∫ßn th∆∞·ªüng cho b√© khi b√© l√†m t·ªët 1 vi·ªác g√¨ ƒë√≥. Qu√° ti·ªán lun √Ω.
Gummies c·ªßa Healthy c·∫£e √öc th√¨ v·ªën n·ªïi ti·∫øng th∆°m ngon, ko ng·ªçt v·ªã ƒë∆∞·ªùng nh∆∞ gummies M·ªπ.
üç≠ K·∫∏O D·∫¶U C√Å HEALTHY CARE GUMMY OMEGA 3 d√πng cho b√© t·ª´ 2 tu·ªïi tr·ªü l√™n
+ B·ªï sung omega 3 cho b√© gi√∫p b√© s√°ng m·∫Øt, th√¥ng minh.
+ K√≠ch th√≠ch v·ªã gi√°c gi√∫p tr·∫ª ƒÉn ngon mi·ªáng, ti√™u h√≥a t·ªët.
+ TƒÉng c∆∞·ªùng kh·∫£ nƒÉng h√¥ h·∫•p, gi√∫p tr·∫ª ch·ªëng l·∫°i b·ªánh t·∫≠t.
+ Gi·∫£m nguy c∆° m·∫Øc b·ªánh tim m·∫°ch, ƒë·ªôt qu·ªµ cho tr·∫ª khi l·ªõn l√™n.
+ Gi√∫p tr·∫ª ph√°t tri·ªÉn kh·∫£ nƒÉng t∆∞ duy, ph·∫£n x·∫° t·ªët, ph√°t tri·ªÉn t∆∞ duy, logic.
„ÄΩB√© t·ª´ 2 tu·ªïi ng√†y nhai 2- 4 vi√™n.
K·∫∏O GUMMY MULTIVITAMIN
Multivitamin b·ªï sung c√°c vit v√† kho√°ng ch·∫•t thi·∫øt y·∫øu gi√∫p l·∫•p ƒë·∫ßy nh·ªØng kho·∫£ng tr·ªëng dinh d∆∞·ª°ng m√† b√© c√≥ th·ªÉ b·ªã thi·∫øu h·ª•t do ƒÉn u·ªëng kh√¥ng ƒëa d·∫°ng, k√©n ƒÉn, bi·∫øng ƒÉn, t·ª´ ƒë√≥ gi√∫p b√© ph√°t tri·ªÉn kh·ªèe m·∫°nh v√† to√†n di·ªán h∆°n. Vit A t·ªët cho tr√≠ n√£o, c√°c vit nh√≥m B (B1, B2, B6, B12) c·∫£i thi·ªán v·ªã gi√°c k√≠ch th√≠ch b√© ƒÉn ngon v√† h·ªó tr·ª£ h·ªá th·∫ßn kinh. Th√†nh ph·∫ßn gummy c√≤n ch·ª©a vit C - ch·∫•t ch·ªëng oxy h√≥a m·∫°nh, c√≥ vai tr√≤ quan tr·ªçng trong vi·ªác tƒÉng c∆∞·ªùng mi·ªÖn d·ªãch cho tr·∫ª'
